title: Chiropractor Shrewsbury MA | inBalance Chiropractic and Wellness
description: Improve your body's function by addressing its structure through chiropractic, massage, nutrition and other natural therapies. Call inBalance Chiropractic and Wellness today! (508) 425-3304
sitename: Shrewsbury Chiropractor - inBalance Chiropractic and Wellness
cleaned_text: Chiropractic and Wellness](https://www.inbalancecw.com/about-us/) is a health clinic focusing on both wellness and acute/chronic pain. Natural and holistic methods are utilized to achieve optimal physical, internal and emotional health. The [integrative wellness team](https://www.inbalancecw.com/meet-the-doctors/) offers individualized care in a friendly, welcoming environment. From the moment you walk in our door, we offer the highest standard of customer service and patient care.
